summary: In a Scandinavian country, national security chief Colonel Tahlvik is tasked to rescue the passengers of a high-jacked British airliner while the British Ambassador is being held hostage at his residence by another terrorist team.
cast: Sean Connery|Ian McShane|Jeffry Wickham|Isabel Dean|John Quentin|Robert Harris|James Maxwell|William Fox|Harry Landis|Norman Bristow|John Cording|Christopher Ellison|Richard Hampton|Preston Lockwood|Karen Maxwell|Colin Prockter|Malcolm Rennie|Knut Wigert|Knut M. Hansson|Frimann Falck Clausen|Kaare Kroppan|Alf Malland|Brita Rogde|Sven Aune|Per Tofte|Peter Birrel|Frøydis Damslora|Philip Ettington|Inger Heldal|Robert Lang|Nøste Schwab|Kåre Wicklund
title: Aeropuerto: S.O.S. vuelo secuestrado
